name: Samurai Creator
description:
Want to create your own samurai? Now you can with the samurai creator! Choose from tons of cool outfits and hairstyles to create the samurai warrior or Japanese swordsman of your dreams!

Features


  • 8 Cool Outfits
  • 5 Handsome Hairstyles
  • 14 Different facial expressions
  • Saving your character as a transparent .PNG image
